Name: Pitcher and the Whale
About the game: With his trusty bucket in hand, Pitcher dives into action! Take control of a young fox named Pitcher as he explores a mountain to find water sources, and bring buckets of water to a dehydrated whale. The mountain is host to dark caverns, mysterious stones, and all kinds of helpful and harmful animals. But nothing is impossible for Pitcher and his bucket! Explore a 2D world by jumping, crawling, and dashing! Put PItcher's bucket in water to fill it up, and bring it to the whale! PItcher's bucket can also break certain rocks, stun enemies, and float on water! The whale slowly dries up as the sun begins to set, so be sure to keep bringing water back! There are gems hidden in the mountain that seem to help the whale somehow...
